title: Notable ETF Outflow Detected - SLYV, BLD, DAR, SJI - Nasdaq.com
text: Looking today at week-over-week shares outstanding changes among the universe of ETFs covered at ETF Channel , one standout is the SPDR S&P 600 Small Cap Value ETF (Symbol: SLYV) where we have detected an approximate $57.4 million dollar outflow -- that's a 2.8% decrease week over week (from 35,900,000 to 34,900,000). Among the largest underlying components of SLYV, in trading today TopBuild Corp (Symbol: BLD) is up about 2.5%, Darling Ingredients Inc (Symbol: DAR) is up about 1%, and South Jersey Industries, Inc. (Symbol: SJI) is higher by about 0.6%. For a complete list of holdings, visit the SLYV Holdings page » The chart below shows the one year price performance of SLYV, versus its 200 day moving average:
